name: anointed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a person) made holy in a religious ceremony that involves putting holy water or oil on them: anointed by God
formally named as king or queen, especially as part of a ceremony: The crown prince is the anointed successor to the throne.
chosen or expected to get an important position: He presented himself as the president's anointed heir. She is seen as the anointed successor to the current CEO, due to retire next year. See
anoint
More examplesFewer examplesHe is the favourite, the anointed one.This victory cemented him as the anointed king of bike racing.He was hoping to be on the ballot as the anointed nominee of the Reform Party.
